title: [EP 239] The Return of Superman
description: Lee Dong-gook, Sam Hammington, Ko Ji-yong
text:
The Return of Superman (Hangul: ÏäàÌçºÎß®Ïù¥ ÎèåÏïÑÏôîÎã§; also known as Superman Is Back) is a South Korean reality-variety show that airs on KBS2.

Celebrity dads are left to care of their kids alone for 48 hours without the help of anyone, while their wives leave the home to enjoy some relaxing time off.[2] The wives are shown leaving the home before the 48 hours begins and coming back to greet their family once the 48 hours have ended. During the 48 hours the dads and children are either doing a task the wives have written out for the dads to complete, or the dads are exploring new activities with their kids. Occasionally celebrity friends of the dads will stop by to interact with the kids.

title: [EP 329] After School Club
text:
After School Club, often shortened to ASC, is a South Korean internet-based live-music request television talk show co-hosted by Park Jimin, Seungmin and Heejun.

 This episode: The group with infinite growth, Stray Kids(Ïä§Ìä∏Î†àÏù¥ ÌÇ§Ï¶à)!

title: [WEEK 4] Big Stage
text: 4th week of Big Stage Live, a new singing program from Astro.

title: [2018.04.20] Music Bank
text:
Music Bank is a South Korean music program which airs every Friday at 17:00 KST on KBS2.

This week guests: EXID, EXO-CBX, TWICE, Eric Nam, UNB, MONSTA X, NCT 2018, THE BOYZ, etc.

[TV SHOW] [CARTOONS]

title: [EP 1] Gundam Build Fighters
description: Ry≈ç Hirohashi, Masashi Hirose, Mikako Komatsu
text: Sei Iori aims to participate in the Gunpla Battle Championship World Tournament, but despite his skill at building models, he can't control them in battle. Then Sazaki challenges him to a Gunpla battle in order to get his hands on Sei's high-performance Gunpla. Sei accepts the battle, thinking that if he can't even beat Sazaki, then he'd be defeated instantly if he made it to the championship. But Sei is backed into a corner by Sazaki's overbearing fighting style until the appearance of Reiji, a mysterious boy who he met earlier that day. Even though Reiji has never used Gunpla before, he overwhelms Sazaki's Gunpla with his superb control technique. Sei builds, and Reiji battles. Thus the Gundam Build Fighters are born!

title: [EP 1] Mobile Suit Gundam SEED
text: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED HD REMASTER-Episode 1: False Peace

title: [WEEK 1] I Can See Your Voice (Malaysia)
text: Kini rancangan popular I Can See Your Voice edisi Malaysia akan menghiburkan anda setiap minggu bersama artis terkenal sebagai juri jemputan ! Adakah tepat tekaan mereka adalah seorang ‚ÄòPenyanyi Sebenar‚Äô atau hanya ‚ÄòPenyamar‚Äô ?

title: [EP 1] Mr Bean the Animated Series
text: Life is a difficult challenge for Mr Bean, who despite being a grown adult, has trouble completing even the simplest of tasks. Thankfully, his perseverance is usually rewarded, and he finds an ingenious way around the problem.

title: [EP 1] Tom & Jerry
text: Centers on a rivalry between its two title characters, Tom, a cat, and Jerry, a mouse.

title: [EP 1] Upin & Ipin
text: Curious and fun-loving 5-year-old twin brothers Upin and Ipin learn and explore new things.

title: [Inside Story] Al Jazeera News
text:
Follow Al Jazeera as it covers what's happening around the world.
How worrying is the rise of US right-wing extremism? | Inside Story

title: Arirang News- Foreign Correspondents
text: Foreign Correspondents from all around the globe sit down to discuss issues happening in-and-out of Korea on our news talk program, [Foreign Correspondents]! [Foreign Correspondents] delivers not only the most recent news, but also other unveiled behind stories, as well as their own thoughts regarding the issues. Furthermore, as current affairs from Korea have greater impact on the world than ever, the current status of our society will be redefined through the objective eyes of foreign correspondents.

title: Euronews- Raw Politics
text:
Euronews is a multilingual news media service, headquartered in Lyon, France.

British budget, Bolsonaro victory, Merkel announcement

title: Buletin Awani 7:45
text:
Astro Awani is the in-house rolling television news and current affairs channel providing 24-hour news coverage including news in Malay.

Isu nasional tumpuan laporan sidang Dewan Rakyat

title: KBS News 9
text:
KBS Nine O'Clock News is the flagship newscast that airs on KBS1 every night at 9:00pm KST.

25th October 2018 news.

title: [Men's Single QF] 2018 All England Open
text:
Match: LIN Dan (CHN) [6] vs LEE Chong Wei (MAS) [2]

The 2018 All England Open, officially YONEX All England Open 2018 was a badminton tournament which took place at Arena Birmingham in England from 14 to 18 March 2018 and had a total purse of $1,000,000.

title: [Asia] 2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup Qualifiers
text:
Watch the full game between Philippines and Japan from the FIBA Basketball World Cup 2019 Asian Qualifiers. 

Process to determine the teams that will participate at the 2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup.

title: [Semi Final MAS vs SIN] Asian Netball Championships 2018
text:
Malaysia üá≤üáæ vs üá∏üá¨ Singapore

 The Asian Netball Championship is a netball competition held every two years with teams from across Asia competing.

title: [EP 1] Best Shot
text:
ESPN Analyst and Former NBA player Jay Williams joins Newark Central High School Basketball Coach Shawn McCray for the 2018-2019 season. 
Learning lessons both on and off the court, the team will soon realize that no game is won in the first quarter.

title: [Callum Hudson-Odoi] Chelsea Films
text:
Get to know Chelsea like no one ever did before.

Callum Hudson-Odoi has impressed during his breakthrough pre-season campaign for Chelsea. 
Now Blues boss Maurizio Sarri has stated that the youngster will be joining the first-team squad.

title: Gone
text:
It was nine o‚Äôclock one sunny California morning, and Geoffrey Strong stood under the live-oak trees in Las Flores Ca√±on, with a pot of black paint in one hand and a huge brush in the other.  He could have handled these implements to better purpose and with better grace had not his arms been firmly held by three laughing girls, who pulled not wisely, but too well.  He was further incommoded by the presence of a small urchin who lay on the dusty ground beneath his feet, fastening an upward clutch on the legs of his trousers.

There were three large canvas tents directly in front of them, yet no one of these seemed to be the object of dissension, but rather a redwood board, some three feet in length, which was nailed on a tree near by. twitch of her cousin‚Äôs sleeve.

title: Deep into the Deep Sleep
text: In 2100, when humanity has abandoned the earth, a colony of extravagant creatures still thrives in the deepest abyss of the ocean. Deep, an adventurous "dumbo" octopus and the last one of his kind lives there with his two unconditional friends: Evo, a nerdy and clumsy angler fish, and Alice, a neurotic deep-sea shrimp. When an accident destroys their home, the guardian of the abyss, The Kraken, will send Deep and his friends on a perilous journey to find a new home. In their mission, they will be joined by Maura -a voracious moray eel- and together they will travel to amazing places like the submerged city of New York, the Titanic or the Arctic, facing formidable enemies and hilarious situations. Will they be able to bring the oceans back to their former glory?

title: We
text: In the pursuit for love and happiness, ETHAN, a man with great ambitions and a big heart, must face many obstacles, some that threaten to halt his quest. Set on filling an emptiness left by the death of his parents years ago, Ethan can't seem to find that one connection we all desire. Yet he continues moving forward despite the many drawbacks he faces.

title: The Fairy
text: A hotel clerk searches all over Le Havre for the fairy who made two of his three wishes come true before disappearing.

title: Cursed
text: A werewolf loose in Los Angeles changes the lives of three young adults who, after being mauled by the beast, learn they must kill it in order to avoid becoming werewolves themselves.

title: My Crazy One
text: Out-of-the-box Simon Roberts runs an ad agency with his Type-A daughter Sydney.

title: A Cold Night to Stay
text: FBI Agent Parr is going through a bad spell: his partner and best friend has just retired, and his wife has just left him. While investigating a robbery at a gun shop by a paramilitary gang, Parr and his new partner, Sinclaire, find clues to a plot to level the entire city of Chicago. Their main suspect is a recent Vietnamese immigrant with experience as a weapons researcher and a burning grudge against the U.S. Is he the man they're looking for? And if so, can they track him down before it's too late?

title: The Silence
description: Baran bo Odar, Jan Costin Wagner
text: 13-year-old Sinikka vanishes on a hot summer night. Her bicycle is found in the exact place where a girl was killed 23 years ago. The dramatic present forces those involved in the original case to face their past.

title: Hear the Roar
text: Louise has an exceptional talent as singer and actress. She is on a journey to discover her God-given purpose and wants to consider a career as Broadway actress, but her father, a South African game ranger who is stuck in the past, wants her to settle in the African bushveld, marry his right-hand-man Andr√© and live nearby. This causes inner turmoil for Louise and tension builds between father and daughter. To make matters worse, a life-and-death situation arises when Louise, Andr√© and her father encounter a lethal band of game poachers.

title: If We Were a Season | Ïö∞Î¶¨Í∞Ä Í≥ÑÏ†àÏù¥ÎùºÎ©¥
text: Two high school students were born and raised together as neighbors. This boy and girl are more like a married couple. They don‚Äôt say it, but they are precious to each other. Then one day, a new student appears. Unlike these two who don‚Äôt express their hearts, he‚Äôs brave and bold in expressing his feelings. He was enough to shake up the relationship of these two students. It was when everything was yet immature and clumsy. Let‚Äôs think about our forgotten past. Cast: Chae Soobin, Jang Dongyoon, Jinyoung. [MOVIE] [K-MOVIE] [KOREAN MOVIE]
trailerUrl: https://storage.googleapis.com/android-tv/Sample videos/Google+/Google+_ Sharing but like real life.mp4

recommended.title: My Happy Home | Ï¶êÍ±∞Ïö¥ ÎÇòÏùò Ïßë
recommended.description: Genius scientist Sejeong lives with her cyborg husband Sungmin. She erased Sungmin‚Äôs memories and inputted new customized memories and information of her choosing, so she is able to enjoy a blissful marriage. Then someone Sejeong and Sungmin knew before he became a cyborg starts coming to their home. This person tries to correct Sungmin‚Äôs distorted memories while Sejeong tries to stop her. Sungmin, in the meantime, starts lying like a human being. What happened before Sungmin was turned into a cyborg? Cast: Son Yeo-eun, Lee Sangyeob, Kim Myungsoo, Lee Ilhwa, Park Hana, Lim Jikyu, Song Yoona, Ok Taecyeon. [MOVIE] [K-MOVIE] [KOREAN MOVIE]

recommended.title: Don't Worry, I'm a Ghost | Í±±Ï†ïÎßàÏÑ∏Ïöî, Í∑ÄÏã†ÏûÖÎãàÎã§
recommended.description: A man wakes up at the hospital following an accident. He can‚Äôt remember his name, his family or where he lives. He learns his name and address from the police who ran his fingerprints and goes to his house. He sleeps an uncomfortable sleep and finds a girl looking at him when he wakes up. She says she‚Äôs a ghost. Lee Mungi thinks he‚Äôs seeing things due to aftereffects of the accident but finds her picture at her funeral. Her name was Kim Yeonhwa and he wants to know why she came to him. He asks her if she wants him to find the suspect and get revenge. But she says the police can do that and tells him he has a more important job to do. She tells him the reason she came to him is in his lost memories. Cast: Bong Tae-gyu, Park Shin-hye, Lee Ha-yool, Park Seo-yeon. [MOVIE] [K-MOVIE] [KOREAN MOVIE]

recommended.title: Kang Deoksun's Love History | Í∞ïÎçïÏàú Ïï†Ï†ï Î≥ÄÏ≤úÏÇ¨
recommended.description: Everyone knows who Yun Bonggil is but not Lee Hwarim, who accompanied him. We know of the Korean Provisional Government, but we don‚Äôt know of Jeong Jeonghwa who took care of things inside Korea. We are unfamiliar with their names, but they were female independence activists who really existed. Just because their achievements weren‚Äôt recognized and they went different paths, they are being forgotten. This drama depicts the traces of these women. Cast: Kim Sohye, Oh Seungyoon. [MOVIE] [K-MOVIE] [KOREAN MOVIE]

recommended.title: Middle School Student A | Ï§ëÌïôÏÉù AÏñë
recommended.description: Haejun has been no. 1 in his middle school in Gangbuk, but his family moves to Daechi to go to a better high school. Eunseo has always been no. 1 in her school but Haejun takes her place as soon as he enters the new school. The students including Eunseo, Nayeon decide to shake Haejun up and try to drop his rank. Taejun develops feelings for Eunseo and gets attacked by the other students. Cast : Lee Yuleum, Gwag Dongyeon,Lee Hanna, Kim Beomjoon. [MOVIE] [K-MOVIE] [KOREAN MOVIE]

Cast: Son Yeo-eun, Lee Sangyeob, Kim Myungsoo, Lee Ilhwa, Park Hana, Lim Jikyu, Song Yoona, Ok Taecyeon. [MOVIE] [K-MOVIE] [KOREAN MOVIE]

recommended.title: Don't Worry, I'm a Ghost | Í±±Ï†ïÎßàÏÑ∏Ïöî, Í∑ÄÏã†ÏûÖÎãàÎã§
recommended.description: A man wakes up at the hospital following an accident. He can‚Äôt remember his name, his family or where he lives. He learns his name and address from the police who ran his fingerprints and goes to his house. He sleeps an uncomfortable sleep and finds a girl looking at him when he wakes up. She says she‚Äôs a ghost. Lee Mungi thinks he‚Äôs seeing things due to aftereffects of the accident but finds her picture at her funeral. Her name was Kim Yeonhwa and he wants to know why she came to him. He asks her if she wants him to find the suspect and get revenge. But she says the police can do that and tells him he has a more important job to do. She tells him the reason she came to him is in his lost memories. Cast: Bong Tae-gyu, Park Shin-hye, Lee Ha-yool, Park Seo-yeon. [MOVIE] [K-MOVIE] [KOREAN MOVIE]

recommended.title: Kang Deoksun's Love History | Í∞ïÎçïÏàú Ïï†Ï†ï Î≥ÄÏ≤úÏÇ¨
recommended.description: Everyone knows who Yun Bonggil is but not Lee Hwarim, who accompanied him. We know of the Korean Provisional Government, but we don‚Äôt know of Jeong Jeonghwa who took care of things inside Korea. We are unfamiliar with their names, but they were female independence activists who really existed. Just because their achievements weren‚Äôt recognized and they went different paths, they are being forgotten. This drama depicts the traces of these women. Cast: Kim Sohye, Oh Seungyoon. [MOVIE] [K-MOVIE] [KOREAN MOVIE]

recommended.title: If We Were a Season | Ïö∞Î¶¨Í∞Ä Í≥ÑÏ†àÏù¥ÎùºÎ©¥
recommended.description: Two high school students were born and raised together as neighbors. This boy and girl are more like a married couple. They don‚Äôt say it, but they are precious to each other. Then one day, a new student appears. Unlike these two who don‚Äôt express their hearts, he‚Äôs brave and bold in expressing his feelings. He was enough to shake up the relationship of these two students. It was when everything was yet immature and clumsy. Let‚Äôs think about our forgotten past. Cast: Chae Soobin, Jang Dongyoon, Jinyoung. [MOVIE] [K-MOVIE] [KOREAN MOVIE]
